STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_MAPS
STATEMENT.query: SELECT M.MAP_ID as ID, M.NAME, M.DESCR, M.FORMAT, count(MF.FEATURE_ID) AS NUM_FEATURES FROM SBI_GEO_MAPS M LEFT JOIN SBI_GEO_MAP_FEATURES MF ON MF.MAP_ID = M.MAP_ID GROUP BY M.MAP_ID, M.NAME, M.DESCR, M.URL, M.FORMAT

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_ALL_FEATURES
STATEMENT.query: SELECT F.FEATURE_ID as ID, F.NAME, F.DESCR, F.TYPE,count(MF.map_id) AS NUM_MAPS FROM SBI_GEO_FEATURES F LEFT JOIN SBI_GEO_MAP_FEATURES MF ON MF.FEATURE_ID = F.FEATURE_ID GROUP by F.FEATURE_ID, F.NAME, F.DESCR, F.TYPE

STATEMENT.name: SELECT_LOOKUP_FEATURES
STATEMENT.query: SELECT F.FEATURE_ID as ID, F.NAME, F.DESCR, F.TYPE FROM SBI_GEO_FEATURES F
